resources.string:
* 2 CUP of Graham Cracker crumbs
* 6 TBLSP of unsalted butter, melted
* 0.5 CUP of granulated sugar
* 1.5 TSP of salt
* 5 TBLSP of vanilla
* 1 K of Nutella or other chocolate-hazelnut spread
* 500 G of Mascapone Cheese(room temperature)
* 1 CUP of heavy cream(cold)
* 4 OZ of cream cheese(softened)

2. Whisk the graham cracker crumbs, 50 grams (1/4 cup) of sugar, and 1/2 teaspoon of salt together in a medium bowl. Pour the melted butter and 1 teaspoon of vanilla into the dry ingredients and stir together until evenly mixed.
